document_data.name: Nimbul
document_data.mainbody: e bounty hunter had a somewhat odd personality. He was a minor mage, and could cast basic [[spell]]s.
document_data.Description: The bounty hunter had a somewhat odd personality. He was a minor mage, and could cast basic [[spell]]s.
document_data.Abilities: Nimbul knew how to cast the spells ''[[horror]]'', ''[[magic missile]]'', and ''[[mirror image]]''.
document_data.Possessions: Nimbul owned a ''[[Topsider's Crutch]]'', a pair of ''[[Senses of the Cat]]'' [[boot]]s,This item was only found on Nimbul's body in the [[Baldur's Gate: Enhanced Edition|''Enhanced Edition'']] of [[Baldur's Gate (game)|''Baldur's Gate'']]. He fought with [[throwing axe]]s and an [[enchanted]] ''[[short sword]] +1''.
